name: Space Evader (HowYouDoing)
description:
Goal: Stay alive as long as possible by evading all that is red.

  • An space arcade inspired game where you have to evade an attack of dozens of missiles chasing you for as long as possible.
  • Try to beat the high scores! You can leave your score in the comments if you want.
  • Play with Keyboard or Controller.
  • Playing in turns with friends is also recommended.

Note: The browser version seems to lag a bit, so it might be wise to get the downloaded version. 

(Sorry if the arcade "music" annoys you. It can be muted if you want:)
